attributes.action: Get the Police back on the streets
attributes.background: Scrambler bikes no lights , dressed in black. Kids on cycles no lights dressed in black. Stabbing shootings. GET A GRIP government NOW!

rejection.details:
Decisions about policing in your local area are the responsibility of your local elected Police and Crime Commissioner. You can find out who your Police and Crime Commissioner is here:

https://www.police.uk/

If you'd like the Government to give more funding to police forces, you could start a new petition asking for that.
